catch_copy:
Survivor-style action with 7 cat girls!
Over 40 combination skills and infinite growth up to level 1000!
copyright_text: © 2025 Minimum Studio Corp. All Rights Reserved.
description:
Cat Girl Survivor is a survivor-style action game where you fight endless waves of enemies alongside adorable cat girl characters.

◆ Game Features
- 7 unique cat girl characters with distinct personalities
- Over 40 combination skills for infinite strategic possibilities
- Endless character growth up to level 1000
- Equipment system to freely upgrade your favorite weapons
- Easy and comfortable gameplay with auto-attack system
- Roguelike elements for fresh fun every playthrough
- Diverse stages and boss battles

◆ How to Play
Characters automatically attack nearby enemies. Players only need to focus on movement and skill selection. Level up to acquire new skills and combine them to unleash powerful combination skills!

◆ Combination Skill System
When you acquire specific skills together, they evolve into even more powerful combination skills. Discover over 40 combinations and create your own ultimate build.

◆ Infinite Growth System
You can level up each character to level 1000, and freely enhance your favorite weapons through the equipment system. Experience characters that become stronger over time.

◆ Endless Challenge, Infinite Dungeon
Addictively engaging gameplay that's hard to stop once you start! Each playthrough features different skill combinations, allowing you to try new strategies. Challenge yourself against increasingly powerful enemies, aim for higher floors, and enjoy the thrill of endless growth. Experience the exhilarating gameplay that makes you say "just one more run"!

Defeat the hordes of enemies and complete your ultimate cat girl!
